page.title: 10KINGMOOR NOTABLE EVENTS
page.content: {KINGMOOR NOTABLE EVENTS {Christmas Party}Every Christmas there is a party at the school.Party tickets are sold a week before by a man from the Residents' Association. You have games,food and watch film cartoons on the screen. {Summer Fete}This event takes place on the school playground during the summer.There are lots of games.The prizes for the winners are some sweets.The Residents' Association have a small band of musicians.Food and drink are available. {Bonfire Night}Bonfire night takes place on 5th November.You have to pay to get in but once you're in you can watch the fireworks or buy some food to eat,like hotdogs and beefburgers. You can also buy sparklers for the children.
